CustomField.description: Description of any specific characteristics to the PPA. This could include a variable rate that doesn't follow a specific escalator, co-development fees, or other idiosyncrasies.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Description of any specific characteristics to the PPA. This could include a variable rate that doesn't follow a specific escalator, co-development fees, or other idiosyncrasies.
CustomField.label: PPA Specifics
